
            <h1 class="postTitle">
                <a id="cb_post_title_url" class="postTitle2 vertical-middle" href="https://www.cnblogs.com/GuijiH6/p/18769797" title="发布于 2025-03-13 14:09">
    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">文件上传fuzz工具-Upload_Auto_Fuzz</span>
    

</a>

            </h1>
            <div class="clear"></div>
            <div class="postBody">
                <div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body cnblogs-markdown">
<h1 id="一工具介绍">一、工具介绍</h1>
<p>​         在日常遇到文件上传时，如果一个个去测，会消耗很多时间，如果利用工具去跑的话就会节省很多时间，本<strong>Burp Suite插件</strong>专为文件上传漏洞检测设计，提供自动化Fuzz测试，共300+条payload。</p>
<p>源地址：</p>
<pre><code class="language-php">https://github.com/T3nk0/Upload_Auto_Fuzz
</code></pre>
<h1 id="二功能特点">二、功能特点</h1>
<h2 id="waf绕过功能">waf绕过功能</h2>
<ul>
<li><strong>后缀变异</strong>：ASP/ASPX/PHP/JSP后缀混淆（空字节、双扩展名、特殊字符等）</li>
<li><strong>内容编码</strong>：MIME编码、Base64编码、RFC 2047规范绕过</li>
<li><strong>协议攻击</strong>：HTTP头拆分、分块传输编码、协议走私</li>
</ul>
<h2 id="系统特性">系统特性</h2>
<p><strong>windwos特性</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>
<p>NTFS数据流（::$DATA）</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>保留设备名（CON, AUX）</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>长文件名截断</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>linux特性</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Apache多级扩展解析</li>
<li>路径遍历尝试</li>
<li>点号截断攻击</li>
</ul>
<h2 id="内容欺骗">内容欺骗</h2>
<ul>
<li>魔术字节注入（GIF/PNG/PDF头）</li>
<li>SVG+XSS组合攻击</li>
<li>文件内容混淆（注释插入、编码变异）</li>
</ul>
<h1 id="三使用指南及效果">三、使用指南及效果</h1>
<p>这里以<strong>uploads-labs</strong>为例，选择一个文件上传</p>
<p><img src="https://track123.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/20250313135910544.png" alt="image-20250313135910450" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>然后burp开启拦截，抓包</p>
<p><img src="https://track123.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/20250313135859377.png" alt="image-20250313135859293" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>右键选择</p>
<p><img src="https://track123.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/20250313140003932.png" alt="image-20250313140003871" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>将这两个地方添加变量</p>
<p><img src="https://track123.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/20250313140127935.png" alt="image-20250313140127854" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>点击<strong>payload</strong>选择此处</p>
<p><img src="https://track123.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/20250313140402013.png" alt="image-20250313140401932" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>点击选择生成器，选择此处即可</p>
<p><img src="https://track123.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/20250313140456001.png" alt="image-20250313140455929" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>取消勾选，默认是勾选的，如下</p>
<p><img src="https://track123.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/20250313140559881.png" alt="image-20250313140559810" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>随后即可攻击，然后查看相应结果即可</p>
<p><img src="https://track123.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/20250313140710516.png" alt="image-20250313140710365" loading="lazy"></p>
<h1 id="四安装教程">四、安装教程</h1>
<p>首先下载安装包，然后解压</p>
<p><img src="https://track123.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/20250313135207757.png" alt="image-20250313135207694" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>打开<strong>burp</strong>，进入扩展设置点击<strong>添加</strong></p>
<p><img src="https://track123.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/20250313135240291.png" alt="image-20250313135240224" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>选择<strong>python</strong>然后选择下载的<strong>py</strong>文件即可</p>
<p><img src="https://track123.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/20250313135351202.png" alt="image-20250313135351126" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>如下即成功导入</p>
<p><img src="https://track123.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/20250313135425696.png" alt="image-20250313135425650" loading="lazy"></p>

</div>
<div class="clear"></div>
